TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Дополнительные сведения об обработке событий см. в разделе [NIB: Потребление событий](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). Событие может возникать только при вызове метода.The event can occur only when you call the method. ## Examples В следующем примере используется событие для печати различных свойств неизвестного узла XML, выдаваемое при вызове класса метод.The following example uses the event of the to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: Возвращает номер строки неизвестного узла XML.

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML node.
The line number of the unknown XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinePosition As Integer
public: property int LinePosition { int get(); };

summary.span: Возвращает позицию в строке неизвестного узла XML.

span.span: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML node.
The position number of the unknown XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalName As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Возвращает локальное имя XML десериализуемого узла XML.

span.span: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Локальное имя XML десериализуемого узла XML.

span.span: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Свойство Возвращает локальное имя (локальная часть) полное имя XML.The property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. Свойства соответствует 1999 http://www.w3.org спецификации `Namespaces in XML`.The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. ## Examples В следующем примере выводится неизвестного узла XML, выдаваемое при вызове класса метод.The following example prints the of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the XML node being deserialized.
The name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples В следующем примере выводится имя неизвестного узла, который вызывает возникновения события.The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NamespaceURI As String
public: property System::String ^ NamespaceURI { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Возвращает пространство имен URI, связанное с десериализуемым узелом XML.

span.span: Gets the namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Пространство имен URI, связанное с десериализуемым узелом XML.

span.span: The namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples В следующем примере выводится URI неизвестного узла XML, который вызывает возникновения события.The following example prints the URI of the unknown XML node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

span.span: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.
The that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Перечисление возвращает описание десериализуемого узла.The enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. Например возвращает «Комментарий», если узел является комментарием.For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment. ## Examples В следующем примере выводится описание неизвестного узла, который вызывает возникновения события.The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectBeingDeserialized As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ObjectBeingDeserialized { System::Object ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Examples В следующем примере выводится значение, возвращаемое метод при метод обнаруживает неизвестный узел XML.The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown XML node. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the text of the XML node being deserialized.
The text of the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples В следующем примере выводится текст неизвестного узла XML, который вызывает возникновения события.The following example prints the text of the unknown XML node that caused the event to occur.
